title: #214: Forensically Deconstructing Jeffrey Epstein Part 9
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti continue to analyze Episode #6 of Wondery's series 'The Mysterious Mr Epstein.' We unravel and discuss Epstein's web of abuse and reprehensible behaviour, the enablers as well as the myths, misconceptions and language that can mask child sexual vicitmisation and domestic and sexual abuse.


#Epstein

#EpsteinCoverUp

#ChildSexTrafficking

#VicitmsMatter
